OOC: well, electricity theorically hurts them, but all we know for sure is 
that it is conducted by metal.... make the conclusions you wish....

>
>Gemini Dragon: "Bring it on."
>
>Gemini Dragon laughed evily as it spun around sending its tail at
>Trainwreck.(Btw omega, Electricity does hurt robots, just letting you
>know...))
>

> > Train Wreck transforms and flips backwards to avoid it.
> >
